mapper.select: SELECT gif_story_story_master.story_id ,content ,phone_id ,story_date ,gif_story_stamp_master.stamp_name FROM gif_story_story_master LEFT OUTER JOIN gif_story_story_stamp_mapping ON gif_story_story_master.story_id = gif_story_story_stamp_mapping.story_id LEFT OUTER JOIN gif_story_stamp_master ON gif_story_story_stamp_mapping.stamp_id = gif_story_stamp_master.stamp_id WHERE phone_id = #{phone_id} ORDER by story_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gif_story_story_master (content, phone_id, story_date) VALUES (#{content}, #{phone_id}, curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT story_id ,content ,story_date FROM gif_story_story_queue NATURAL JOIN gif_story_story_master WHERE phone_id != #{phone_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT gif_story_recieved_story.story_id, gif_story_story_master.content, gif_story_story_master.story_date FROM gif_story_recieved_story INNER JOIN gif_story_story_master ON gif_story_recieved_story.story_id = gif_story_story_master.story_id WHERE gif_story_recieved_story.phone_id = #{phone_id} ORDER BY gif_story_recieved_story.story_id desc LIMIT 5

SELECT stamp_id ,stamp_name ,stamp_url ,stamp_type ,stamp_order FROM gif_story_stamp_master
WHERE stamp_id > #{stamp_id}

SELECT gif_story_story_stamp_mapping.stamp_id ,gif_story_stamp_master.stamp_name FROM gif_story_story_stamp_mapping LEFT OUTER JOIN gif_story_stamp_master ON gif_story_story_stamp_mapping.stamp_id = gif_story_stamp_master.stamp_id WHERE gif_story_story_stamp_mapping.story_id = #{story_id}
